des: "Insanely easy, but oh so rich!  Recipe makes a large amount but you can vary flavorings and coatings to make several different varieties."
ins: In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until smooth. Gradually beat in confectioners' sugar until well blended. Stir in melted chocolate and vanilla until no streaks remain. Refrigerate for about 1 hour. Shape into 1 inch balls.
